originalText.text: I would like to give Gabriel Shoes 5 stars but I did run into some difficulty returning a pair of shoes. Thankfully there is an amazing employee in the customer service department named Sarah who worked patiently with me to solve my problem. I love their selection of shoes.

text.text: I would like to give Gabriel Shoes 5 stars but I did run into some difficulty returning a pair of shoes. Thankfully there is an amazing employee in the customer service department named Sarah who worked patiently with me to solve my problem. I love their selection of shoes.

originalText.text: I ordered a pair of Wolky boots in good faith.  They did not work out for me.  I requested a return on Amazon where I purchased them.  I understood that I would pay $5.00 and some change to return them.  The boots and boxes were clean and in good condition when I gave them to UPS,   A week later I find out that 20% was being taken out of my refund ($60.00).  Unbelievable!  60 dollars to try on a pair of shoes!!  Do not order online from this company!  In decades of online shopping, this is a first bad and very costly lesson to learn.

originalText.text: I bought what I thought were wonderful shoes for my husband who has dementia and Alzheimer’s. I bought through Amazon. They were pricey - $75. 3+ months he wore them. Then I find that the Velcro came off the shoe side. This rendered them totally useless! Shoddy workmanship. I asked for a replacement. I was denied within minutes! He’d had them too long. Well, duh! Anyway, suffice it to say that I won’t buy from Gabriel again. A good seller would stand behind what they sell.

originalText.text: Bought shoes from them via Amazon.  Terrible experience!  The boots were not as advertised.  I returned as unused, all tags still on boots - should have received a full refund, including shipping (as per their advertised 'Guarantee').  They did not refund the shipping.  Will never buy from this vendor again, ever!!

text.text: Bought shoes from them via Amazon.  Terrible experience!  The boots were not as advertised.  I returned as unused, all tags still on boots - should have received a full refund, including shipping (as per their advertised 'Guarantee').  They did not refund the shipping.  Will never buy from this vendor again, ever!!

originalText.text: These shoes are so comfortable. I have one foot smaller than the other and sometimes I have issues with keeping some shoes on that foot but I feel like these shoes hug my feet so I can walk without any worries of stepping out of them. The Wolky shoes is so versatile. Goes with everything. Love doing business with Gabriel Shoes
